body: Story 9/10 | Art 10/10 | Character 10/10 | Enjoyment 9/10 | Overall 9.5/10 | At first, the story is not that strong. Just the usual shy shotacon and hungry milf, but after that it goes crazy. Them shotacon is now dominating. Art also really really good, the penises especially and that sailor uniform too. Enjoy this doujin so much
I have one fucking wish. To see a single Atago and Takao doujins no longer have fucking shotas in it.
